name: culpability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact that someone deserves to be blamed or considered responsible for something bad: After the accident, the company refused to accept culpability. The Army denied any culpability, but later compensated owners. See
culpable
More examplesFewer examplesTwo elements are necessary to prove culpability for a crime.I'm merely suggesting you try to see your own culpability in this.Industrial manufacturers all share culpability for air pollution.
